verses.verse: In the second <WH8147> year <WH8141> of Darius <WH1867> the king <WH4428>, in the sixth <WH8345> month <WH2320>, in the first <WH259> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320>, came the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> by <WH3027> Haggai <WH2292> the prophet <WH5030> unto Z'rubavel <WH2216> the son <WH1121> of Shealtiel <WH7597>, governor <WH6346> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and to Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Josedech <WH3087>, the high <WH1419> Kohen <WH3548>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Thus speaketh <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, This people <WH5971> say <WH559> <WH8804>, The time <WH6256> is not come <WH935> <WH8800>, the time <WH6256> that the YY'S <WH3068> house <WH1004> should be built <WH1129> <WH8736>.
Then came the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> by <WH3027> Haggai <WH2292> the prophet <WH5030>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Is it time <WH6256> for you, O ye, to dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> in your cieled <WH5603> <WH8803> houses <WH1004>, and this house <WH1004> lie waste <WH2720> ?
Now therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; Consider <WH7760> <WH8798> <WH3824> your ways <WH1870>.

Ye have sown <WH2232> <WH8804> much <WH7235> <WH8687>, and bring <WH935> <WH8687> in little <WH4592>; ye eat <WH398> <WH8800>, but ye have not enough <WH7654>; ye drink <WH8354> <WH8800>, but ye are not filled with drink <WH7937> <WH8800>; ye clothe <WH3847> <WH8800> you, but there is none warm <WH2527>; and he that earneth wages <WH7936> <WH8693> earneth wages <WH7936> <WH8693> to put it into a bag <WH6872> with holes <WH5344> <WH8803>.
Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; Consider <WH7760> <WH8798> <WH3824> your ways <WH1870>.

Go up <WH5927> <WH8798> to the mountain <WH2022>, and bring <WH935> <WH8689> wood <WH6086>, and build <WH1129> <WH8798> the house <WH1004>; and I will take pleasure <WH7521> <WH8799> in it, and I will be glorified <WH3513> <WH8735>, saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>.

Ye looked <WH6437> <WH8800> for much <WH7235> <WH8687>, and, lo, it came to little <WH4592>; and when ye brought <WH935> <WH8689> it home <WH1004>, I did blow <WH5301> <WH8804> upon it. Why? saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>. Because <WH3282> of mine house <WH1004> that is waste <WH2720>, and ye run <WH7323> <WH8801> every man <WH376> unto his own house <WH1004>.
Therefore the heaven <WH8064> over you is stayed <WH3607> <WH8804> from dew <WH2919>, and the earth <WH776> is stayed <WH3607> <WH8804> from her fruit <WH2981>.

And I called <WH7121> <WH8799> for a drought <WH2721> upon the land <WH776>, and upon the mountains <WH2022>, and upon the corn <WH1715>, and upon the new wine <WH8492>, and upon the oil <WH3323>, and upon that which the ground <WH127> bringeth forth <WH3318> <WH8686>, and upon men <WH120>, and upon cattle <WH929>, and upon all the labour <WH3018> of the hands <WH3709>.

Then Z'rubavel <WH2216> the son <WH1121> of Shealtiel <WH7597>, and Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Josedech <WH3087>, the high <WH1419> Kohen <WH3548>, with all the remnant <WH7611> of the people <WH5971>, obeyed <WH8085> <WH8799> the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430>, and the words <WH1697> of Haggai <WH2292> the prophet <WH5030>, as the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430> had sent <WH7971> <WH8804> him, and the people <WH5971> did fear <WH3372> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.

Then spake <WH559> <WH8799> Haggai <WH2292> the YY'S <WH3068> messenger <WH4397> in the YY'S <WH3068> message <WH4400> unto the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, I am with you, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

And the YY <WH3068> stirred up <WH5782> <WH8686> the spirit <WH7307> of Z'rubavel <WH2216> the son <WH1121> of Shealtiel <WH7597>, governor <WH6346> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and the spirit <WH7307> of Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Josedech <WH3087>, the high <WH1419> Kohen <WH3548>, and the spirit <WH7307> of all the remnant <WH7611> of the people <WH5971>; and they came <WH935> <WH8799> and did <WH6213> <WH8799> work <WH4399> in the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, their 'Elohim <WH430>,
In the four <WH702> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the sixth <WH8345> month <WH2320>, in the second <WH8147> year <WH8141> of Darius <WH1867> the king <WH4428>.
